trans-unit.source: Allows an object to control its own serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto controlar sua própria serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Any class that might be serialized must be marked with the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer classe que pode ser serializado deve ser marcado com o <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If a class needs to control its serialization process, it can implement the ISerializable interface.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de uma classe controlar o processo de serialização, ela pode implementar a interface ISerializable.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> at serialization time and populates the supplied <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the data required to represent the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>chama o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>em tempo de serialização e preenche fornecido <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>com todos os dados necessários para representar o objeto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> creates a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with the type of the object in the graph.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>cria um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>com o tipo de objeto no gráfico.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>

trans-unit.source: Objects that need to send proxies for themselves can use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A> methods on <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> to change the transmitted information.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que precisam enviar proxies para si mesmos podem usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>métodos em <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>para alterar as informações transmitidas.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of class inheritance, it is possible to serialize a class that derives from a base class that implements ISerializable.
trans-unit.target: No caso de herança de classe, é possível serializar uma classe que deriva de uma classe base que implementa ISerializable.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the derived class should call the base class implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> inside its implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, a classe derivada deve chamar a implementação da classe base de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>dentro de sua implementação de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the data from the base class will not be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os dados da classe base não serão serializados.

trans-unit.source: The ISerializable interface implies a constructor with the signature constructor (<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> information, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> context).
trans-unit.target: A interface ISerializable implica um construtor com o construtor de assinatura (<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> informações, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>contexto).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: At deserialization time, the current constructor is called only after the data in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> has been deserialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de desserialização, o construtor atual é chamado somente depois que os dados no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>desserializados pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: In general, this constructor should be protected if the class is not sealed.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, este construtor deve ser protegido se a classe não for fechada.

trans-unit.source: The order in which objects are deserialized cannot be guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual os objetos são desserializados não pode ser garantida.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one type references a type that has not been deserialized yet, an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um tipo referencia um tipo que ainda não foi desserializado, ocorrerá uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: If you are creating types that have such dependencies, you can work around the problem by implementing the `IDeserializationCallback` interface and the `OnDeserialization` method.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver criando tipos que têm essas dependências, você pode contornar o problema com a implementação de `IDeserializationCallback` interface e o `OnDeserialization` método.

trans-unit.source: The serialization architecture handles object types that extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> the same as types that extend <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: A arquitetura de serialização trata tipos de objetos que estendem <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>os mesmos tipos que estendem <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: These types can be marked with the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> and implement the ISerializable interface as any other object type.
trans-unit.target: Esses tipos podem ser marcados com o <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>e implementa a interface ISerializable como qualquer outro tipo de objeto.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Their object state will be captured and persisted onto the stream.
trans-unit.target: O estado do objeto será capturado e persistente para o fluxo.

trans-unit.source: When these types are being used through <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>, the remoting infrastructure provides a surrogate that preempts typical serialization and instead serializes a proxy to the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.
trans-unit.target: Quando esses tipos estão sendo usados, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>a infraestrutura de comunicação remota fornece um substituto que ocupa o lugar de serialização típica e serializa em vez disso, um proxy para <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>

trans-unit.source: A surrogate is a helper that knows how to serialize and deserialize objects of a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Um substituto é um auxiliar que sabe como serializar e desserializar objetos de um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: The proxy, invisible to the user in most cases, will be of type <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: O proxy, invisível para o usuário na maioria dos casos, será do tipo <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: As a general design pattern, it would be unusual for a class to be both marked with the serializable attribute and extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.
trans-unit.target: Como um padrão de design geral, não seria comum uma classe ser marcado com o atributo serializable e estender <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: Developers should think carefully about the possible serialization and remoting scenarios when combining these two characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores devem pensar cuidadosamente os possíveis cenários de serialização e a comunicação remota ao combinar essas duas características.

trans-unit.source: One example where this might be applicable is with a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo em que isso pode ser aplicável é <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: While the base class of <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> (<xref:System.IO.Stream>) extends from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, it is possible to capture the state of a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and restore it at will.
trans-unit.target: Embora a classe base de <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>(<xref:System.IO.Stream>) se estende de <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, é possível capturar o estado de um <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>e restaurá-lo à vontade.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: It might, therefore, be meaningful to serialize the state of this stream into a database and restore it at some later point in time.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, pode ser significativo para serializar o estado deste fluxo em um banco de dados e restaurá-lo posteriormente em tempo.

trans-unit.source: However, when used through remoting, an object of this type would be proxied.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando usado por meio de comunicação remota, um objeto desse tipo seria delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization of classes that extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a serialização de classes que estendem <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> </xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing ISerializable, see [Custom Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar ISerializable, consulte [serialização personalizada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: Any objects that are included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos que estão incluídos no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automaticamente são rastreadas e serializado pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Code that calls GetObjectData requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> for providing serialization services.
trans-unit.target: Código que chama GetObjectData requer o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>para fornecer serviços de serialização.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not guaranteed that this method will be called only once per object instance during serialization.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não há garantia de que esse método será chamado apenas uma vez por instância do objeto durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the method should be implemented in such a way that its behavior will be the same regardless of the number of times it is called.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o método deve ser implementado de forma que o comportamento será o mesmo, independentemente do número de vezes que ele é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para popular com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino (consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não tem a permissão necessária.
